submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, hCut: List[int], vCut: List[int]) -> int:
        res = 0
        h_c = 1
        v_c = 1
        hCut.sort()
        vCut.sort()
        v_sum = sum(vCut)
        h_sum = sum(hCut)

        while hCut or vCut:
            if  sum(hCut[-1:]) > sum(vCut[-1:]):
                cur = hCut.pop()
                h_sum -= cur
                res += cur * v_c
                h_c += 1
            elif sum(vCut[-1:]) > sum(hCut[-1:]):
                cur = vCut.pop()
                v_sum -= cur
                res += cur * h_c
                v_c += 1
            else:
                if v_sum >= h_sum:
                    res += vCut.pop() * h_c
                    v_c += 1
                else:
                    res += hCut.pop() * v_c
                    h_c += 1
        return res
